note.p: Education: Wadham College, Oxford (matriculated 1673); Middle Temple (admitted 1674)
Freemason, Member, Lodge No 11 at Queen's Head, knaves Acre, Wardour Street, London, one fo the Time Immemorial Lodges which formed Premier Grand Lodge, (founded 1717)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; Foster; MT

Notes: Foster says he or father knighted (1694), Mayor of Bristol (1687, 1694), MP (1695-1700); Hunter says can't be Mayor because called Mr in printed lists after 1694, disappears from lists in 1696, but there is a Thos Day gent resident in Bristol in 1696
References: J Browne, 'Darwin on Darwin. Charles Darwin's The Life of Erasmus Darwin, ed D King-Hele' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 346 - 348
